# üì± Mobile Setup - EPL News Hub PWA

Your EPL News Hub is now a Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be installed on your phone like a native app!

## üöÄ How to Install on Your Phone

### Option 1: Install via Browser (Recommended)

#### On Android (Chrome):
1. Visit your website: `https://eplnewshub.com` or `http://localhost:3000` (for local testing)
2. Look for the install banner at the bottom of the screen
3. Tap "Install" button
4. Or tap the menu (3 dots) ‚Üí "Add to Home screen" ‚Üí "Install"
5. The app icon will appear on your home screen!

#### On iPhone (Safari):
1. Visit your website in Safari
2. Tap the Share button (square with arrow up)
3. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
4. Tap "Add" in the top right
5. The app icon will appear on your home screen!

### Option 2: Deploy to the Web

To make it accessible from anywhere:

#### Deploy to Netlify (Free):
1. Go to [netlify.com](https://netlify.com)
2. Drag your `dist` folder to deploy
3. Get your public URL
4. Visit the URL on your phone and install as above

#### Deploy to Vercel (Free):
1. Install Vercel CLI: `npm i -g vercel`
2. Run: `vercel --prod`
3. Follow the prompts
4. Get your public URL

#### Deploy to GitHub Pages:
1. Push your `dist` folder contents to a `gh-pages` branch
2. Enable GitHub Pages in repository settings
3. Your app will be at: `https://[username].github.io/[repo-name]`

## ‚ú® PWA Features You'll Get:

- **üì± Native App Experience**: Looks and feels like a real app
- **üöÄ Fast Loading**: Cached for instant startup
- **üì° Offline Reading**: Read articles even without internet
- **üîî Push Notifications**: Get news updates (when implemented)
- **üè† Home Screen Icon**: Quick access from your phone's home screen
- **üì± Full Screen**: No browser UI, just your app
- **üíæ Offline Storage**: Articles cached for offline reading

## üõ†Ô∏è Development Commands:

- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build

## üìÇ PWA Files Added:

- `public/manifest.json` - App configuration
- `public/sw.js` - Service worker for offline functionality  
- `src/components/InstallPrompt.jsx` - Install prompt component
- PWA meta tags in `src/index.html`
- Mobile optimizations in `src/index.css`

## üîß Testing Locally:

1. Run `npm run dev`
2. Open `http://localhost:3000` on your phone
3. Test the install prompt and app functionality
4. Make sure your phone and computer are on the same WiFi network

Your EPL News Hub is ready to be a mobile app! üéâ

# üîî Push Notifications Setup Guide - EPL News Hub

This guide will help you set up and test push notifications for both web and mobile versions of EPL News Hub.

## üìã What's Been Set Up

‚úÖ **Capacitor Push Notifications Plugin** - Installed and configured  
‚úÖ **Web Push Service Worker** - Enhanced with push notification support  
‚úÖ **Push Notification Service** - Unified service for web and native notifications  
‚úÖ **Server-side API** - Endpoints for registration and sending notifications  
‚úÖ **Management Interface** - UI for testing and managing notifications  

## üöÄ Quick Start

### 1. Start the Server
```bash
node server.js
```

### 2. Open the Notification Manager
Navigate to: `http://localhost:3000/push-notification-manager.html`

### 3. Enable Notifications
- Click "Enable Notifications" 
- Grant permission when prompted
- You should see "Push notifications are enabled"

### 4. Send a Test Notification
- Click "Send Test Notification"
- You should receive a notification on your device

## üì± Mobile App Setup

### For Android:
1. Build the app: `npm run build:android`
2. Open Android Studio: `npm run open:android`
3. Run the app on a device or emulator
4. Grant notification permissions when prompted

### For iOS:
1. Build the app: `npm run build:ios`
2. Open Xcode: `npm run open:ios`
3. Configure signing and provisioning profiles
4. Run the app on a device or simulator
5. Grant notification permissions when prompted

## üîß Configuration

### VAPID Keys (for Web Push)
You need to generate VAPID keys for web push notifications:

```bash
# Install web-push CLI globally
npm install -g web-push

# Generate VAPID keys
web-push generate-vapid-keys
```

Update these files with your keys:
- `push-notification-service.js` - Update `vapidPublicKey`
- `push-notification-server.js` - Update `vapidKeys`

### Firebase Setup (for Mobile)
For production mobile push notifications, you'll need Firebase:

1. Go to [Firebase Console](https://console.firebase.google.com/)
2. Create a new project
3. Add Android/iOS apps
4. Download configuration files:
   - `google-services.json` for Android
   - `GoogleService-Info.plist` for iOS
5. Update `push-notification-server.js` with Firebase credentials

## üìä API Endpoints

### Register Native Token
```
POST /api/push-notification/register
{
  "token": "device-token",
  "platform": "android|ios",
  "userId": "user-id"
}
```

### Register Web Subscription
```
POST /api/push-notification/subscribe
{
  "subscription": {...},
  "userId": "user-id"
}
```

### Send Test Notification
```
POST /api/push-notification/send-test
{
  "userId": "user-id",
  "title": "Test Title",
  "body": "Test message",
  "url": "/article/url"
}
```

### Send to All Users
```
POST /api/push-notification/send-all
{
  "title": "Breaking News",
  "body": "Liverpool signs new striker!",
  "url": "/articles/liverpool-signing"
}
```

## üß™ Testing

### Web Testing:
1. Open Chrome DevTools
2. Go to Application > Service Workers
3. Check if service worker is registered
4. Go to Application > Storage > Service Worker Storage
5. Test notifications in the manager interface

### Mobile Testing:
1. Install the app on a physical device
2. Enable notifications when prompted
3. Use the notification manager to send test notifications
4. Check device notification center

## üîí Security & Best Practices

### Production Checklist:
- [ ] Replace default VAPID keys with your own
- [ ] Set up proper Firebase credentials
- [ ] Use HTTPS for web push notifications
- [ ] Implement proper user authentication
- [ ] Add rate limiting to prevent spam
- [ ] Store subscriptions in a proper database (not JSON files)
- [ ] Implement unsubscribe functionality
- [ ] Add notification preference management

### Privacy:
- Always request permission before registering for notifications
- Provide easy unsubscribe options
- Respect user notification preferences
- Don't send spam or irrelevant notifications

## üìö File Structure

```
/push-notification-service.js     # Client-side notification service
/push-notification-server.js      # Server-side notification handler
/push-notification-manager.html   # Management interface
/sw.js                            # Service worker (already had push support)
/capacitor.config.json            # Updated with push notification config
/server.js                        # Updated with push notification routes
```

## üêõ Troubleshooting

### Common Issues:

**"Push notifications not supported"**
- Check if you're using HTTPS (required for web push)
- Ensure service worker is properly registered
- Check browser compatibility

**"Permission denied"**
- User needs to manually grant permission
- Check browser notification settings
- Clear browser data and try again

**"No registration token"**
- Check if Capacitor plugin is properly installed
- Ensure device has Google Play Services (Android)
- Check iOS provisioning profile

**"Test notification not received"**
- Check notification permissions
- Verify registration was successful
- Check browser/device notification settings
- Look for errors in console/logs

### Debug Mode:
Enable debug logging by opening browser console and running:
```javascript
localStorage.setItem('debug-push-notifications', 'true');
```

## üöÄ Next Steps

1. **Set up Firebase** for production mobile notifications
2. **Generate proper VAPID keys** for web push
3. **Implement user segmentation** for targeted notifications
4. **Add notification scheduling** for automated news updates
5. **Create notification templates** for different content types
6. **Set up analytics** to track notification performance

## üìû Support

If you encounter issues:
1. Check the browser console for error messages
2. Verify all dependencies are installed
3. Ensure proper permissions are granted
4. Check the troubleshooting section above

Your push notification system is now ready! üéâ

toolUseResult.originalFile:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>EPL Transfer Hub - Latest Premier League Transfers | EPL News Hub</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Track all the latest Premier League transfers, rumors, and confirmed deals. Get real-time updates on player movements across all EPL clubs.">
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="favicon.png">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0-beta3/css/all.min.css">
    
    <style>
        .transfer-hub-hero {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a 0%, #6b4c9a 50%, #8e6bb3 100%);
            padding: 80px 20px 40px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .transfer-hub-hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 50px 50px;
            animation: moveGrid 20s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes moveGrid {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
            100% { transform: translate(50px, 50px); }
        }
        
        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .hero-title {
            font-size: 3.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e, #ffd700);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            text-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.5);
            animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
        }
        
        @keyframes glow {
            from { filter: brightness(1); }
            to { filter: brightness(1.2); }
        }
        
        .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            color: #ffffff;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        
        .transfer-stats {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 40px;
            margin-top: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .stat-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            padding: 20px 30px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .stat-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
        }
        
        .stat-number {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #ffd700;
            display: block;
        }
        
        .stat-card .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #ffffff !important;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            opacity: 0.9;
            display: block;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }
        
        .transfer-controls {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto 20px;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .search-filter-container {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .search-box {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 300px;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .search-box input {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 15px 50px 15px 20px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            border-radius: 50px;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #333333;
            font-size: 1em;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .search-box input:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: #ffd700;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .search-box i {
            position: absolute;
            right: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            color: #ffd700;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .filter-buttons {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .filter-btn {
            padding: 12px 25px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .filter-btn:hover {
            background: #8e6bb3;
            color: white;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .filter-btn.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            border-color: #ffd700;
        }
        
        .transfer-categories {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .category-tab {
            padding: 15px 35px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 50px;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .category-tab::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: -100%;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3), transparent);
            transition: left 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .category-tab:hover::before {
            left: 100%;
        }
        
        .category-tab.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }
        
        .transfers-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 30px;
        }
        
        .transfer-section {
            display: none;
            animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .transfer-section.active {
            display: block;
        }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        /* Enhanced animations for new transfer cards */
        .transfer-card-new {
            animation: slideInUp 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) forwards;
        }

        @keyframes slideInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
            }
        }

        /* Pulse animation for live badge */
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }

        @keyframes urgentPulse {
            0% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
            }
            50% { 
                transform: scale(1.08); 
                box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.6);
            }
            100% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
            }
        }

        /* Enhanced hover states for better polish */
        .transfer-fee:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }

        .player-name:hover {
            color: #ffd700;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }


        @keyframes loadingGradient {

    <script>
    // Inline countdown script - runs immediately after HTML elements are created
    (function() {
        console.log('Inline countdown script starting...');
        
        function updateCountdownNow() {
            // September 1, 2025 at 7:00 PM
            const deadline = new Date('2025-09-01T19:00:00').getTime();
            const now = Date.now();
            const timeLeft = deadline - now;
            
            if (timeLeft <= 0) {
                document.getElementById('days').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('hours').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('minutes').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('seconds').innerHTML = '00';
                console.log('Transfer window closed');
                return;
            }
            
            const days = Math.floor(timeLeft / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
            const hours = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
            const minutes = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
            const seconds = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
            
            // Force update using innerHTML
            const daysEl = document.getElementById('days');
            const hoursEl = document.getElementById('hours');
            const minutesEl = document.getElementById('minutes');
            const secondsEl = document.getElementById('seconds');
            
            if (daysEl) daysEl.innerHTML = String(days).padStart(2, '0');
            if (hoursEl) hoursEl.innerHTML = String(hours).padStart(2, '0');
            if (minutesEl) minutesEl.innerHTML = String(minutes).padStart(2, '0');
            if (secondsEl) secondsEl.innerHTML = String(seconds).padStart(2, '0');
            
            console.log(`Inline countdown: ${days}d ${hours}h ${minutes}m ${seconds}s`);
        }
        
        // Start immediately
        updateCountdownNow();
        
        // Update every second
        setInterval(updateCountdownNow, 1000);
        
        console.log('Inline countdown started successfully');
    })();

        function calculateComparisonMetrics(transfer1, transfer2) {
            // Extract fee values for comparison
            const fee1 = extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee);
            const fee2 = extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee);
            
            // Generate realistic metrics
            const player1Metrics = {
                marketValue: generateMarketValue(fee1),
                age: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 20, // 20-30 years
                contractLength: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 4) + 2} years`,
                valueRating: Math.min(95, Math.max(60, (fee1 / 100) * 100 + Math.random() * 20)),
                marketImpact: Math.min(95, Math.max(50, fee1 + Math.random() * 30))
            };
            
            const player2Metrics = {
                marketValue: generateMarketValue(fee2),
                age: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 20,
                contractLength: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 4) + 2} years`,
                valueRating: Math.min(95, Math.max(60, (fee2 / 100) * 100 + Math.random() * 20)),
                marketImpact: Math.min(95, Math.max(50, fee2 + Math.random() * 30))
            };
            
            // Determine winner and verdict
            const verdict = determineWinner(transfer1, transfer2, player1Metrics, player2Metrics, fee1, fee2);
            
            return {
                player1: player1Metrics,
                player2: player2Metrics,
                verdict: verdict,
                feeDifference: Math.abs(fee1 - fee2) > 0 ? `¬£${Math.abs(fee1 - fee2)}M` : 'Same',
                bestValue: player1Metrics.valueRating > player2Metrics.valueRating ? transfer1.player : transfer2.player
            };
        }

        function extractFeeValue(feeString) {
            if (feeString.toLowerCase().includes('loan') || feeString.toLowerCase().includes('free')) {
                return 0;
            }
            const match = feeString.match(/¬£([\d.]+)M?/);
            return match ? parseFloat(match[1]) : Math.random() * 50 + 10;
        }

        function generateMarketValue(fee) {
            const variance = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 20; // ¬±10M variance
            const marketValue = Math.max(5, fee + variance);
            return `¬£${marketValue.toFixed(1)}M`;
        }

        function determineWinner(transfer1, transfer2, metrics1, metrics2, fee1, fee2) {
            const score1 = metrics1.valueRating + metrics1.marketImpact - (fee1 * 0.5);
            const score2 = metrics2.valueRating + metrics2.marketImpact - (fee2 * 0.5);
            
            if (Math.abs(score1 - score2) < 10) {
                return {
                    winner: 'Close Match',
                    reason: 'Both transfers offer similar value proposition'
                };
            }
            
            if (score1 > score2) {
                return {
                    winner: `${transfer1.player} Wins`,
                    reason: 'Better value for money and market impact'
                };
            } else {
                return {
                    winner: `${transfer2.player} Wins`,
                    reason: 'Superior market value and investment potential'
                };
            }
        }

        function createBarChart(canvas, data) {
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            const maxValue = Math.max(...data.data);
            const padding = 40;
            const barWidth = (canvas.width - padding * 2) / data.data.length - 20;
            
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            
            data.data.forEach((value, index) => {
                const barHeight = (value / maxValue) * (canvas.height - padding * 2);
                const x = padding + index * (barWidth + 20);
                const y = canvas.height - padding - barHeight;
                
                // Create gradient
                const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, y, 0, y + barHeight);
                gradient.addColorStop(0, data.colors[index]);
                gradient.addColorStop(1, data.colors[index] + '80');
                
                ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
                ctx.fillRect(x, y, barWidth, barHeight);
                
                // Add labels
                ctx.fillStyle = '#333';
                ctx.font = '12px Arial';
                ctx.textAlign = 'center';
                ctx.fillText(data.labels[index], x + barWidth / 2, canvas.height - 10);
                ctx.fillText(`¬£${value}M`, x + barWidth / 2, y - 5);
            });
        }

        function createLineChart(canvas, data) {
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            const padding = 40;
            const width = canvas.width - padding * 2;
            const height = canvas.height - padding * 2;
            
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            
            const maxValue = Math.max(...data.datasets.flatMap(d => d.data));
            const pointWidth = width / (data.labels.length - 1);
            
            data.datasets.forEach((dataset, datasetIndex) => {
                ctx.strokeStyle = dataset.color;
                ctx.lineWidth = 3;
                ctx.beginPath();
                
                dataset.data.forEach((value, index) => {
                    const x = padding + index * pointWidth;
                    const y = padding + height - (value / maxValue) * height;
                    
                    if (index === 0) {
                        ctx.moveTo(x, y);
                    } else {
                        ctx.lineTo(x, y);
                    }
                    
                    // Draw points
                    ctx.save();
                    ctx.fillStyle = dataset.color;
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.arc(x, y, 4, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                    ctx.fill();
                    ctx.restore();
                });
                
                ctx.stroke();
            });
            
            // Add labels
            ctx.fillStyle = '#333';
            ctx.font = '12px Arial';
            ctx.textAlign = 'center';
            data.labels.forEach((label, index) => {
                const x = padding + index * pointWidth;
                ctx.fillText(label, x, canvas.height - 10);
            });
        }

                const filters = JSON.parse(saved);
                const panel = document.getElementById('advanced-filters-panel');
                
                if (panel) {
                    panel.querySelector('#min-value').value = filters.minValue || 0;
                    panel.querySelector('#max-value').value = filters.maxValue || 100;
                    panel.querySelector('#min-age').value = filters.minAge || 16;
                    panel.querySelector('#max-age').value = filters.maxAge || 40;
                    
                    if (filters.leagues) {
                        const leagueSelect = panel.querySelector('#league-filter');
                        Array.from(leagueSelect.options).forEach(option => {
                            option.selected = filters.leagues.includes(option.value);
                        });
                    }
                    
                    if (filters.contractStatus) {
                        panel.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]').forEach(cb => {
                            cb.checked = filters.contractStatus.includes(cb.value);
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function saveWatchlistData() {
            const watchlistCards = document.querySelectorAll('.watchlist-card');
            const watchlistData = Array.from(watchlistCards).map(card => {
                const playerName = card.querySelector('h4').textContent;
                const probability = card.querySelector('.probability-value').textContent;
                return { playerName, probability, addedAt: Date.now() };
            });
            
            localStorage.setItem('transferWatchlist', JSON.stringify(watchlistData));
        }

        function loadWatchlistData() {
            const saved = localStorage.getItem('transferWatchlist');
            if (saved) {
                const watchlistData = JSON.parse(saved);
                const watchlistGrid = document.getElementById('watchlist-grid');
                const emptyState = watchlistGrid.querySelector('.empty-watchlist');
                
                if (emptyState && watchlistData.length > 0) {
                    emptyState.remove();
                }
                
                watchlistData.forEach(item => {
                    const watchlistCard = document.createElement('div');
                    watchlistCard.className = 'watchlist-card';
                    watchlistCard.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="watchlist-player-info">
                            <h4>${item.playerName}</h4>
                            <p>Transfer probability: <span class="probability-value">${item.probability}</span></p>
                            <small>Added ${getTimeAgo(item.addedAt)}</small>
                        </div>
                        <button class="remove-from-watchlist" onclick="removeFromWatchlist(this)">
                            <i class="fas fa-times"></i>
                        </button>
                    `;
                    
                    watchlistCard.style.cssText = `
                        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
                        border: 2px solid #e9ecef; border-radius: 15px; padding: 20px;
                        display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
                        margin-bottom: 15px;
                    `;
                    
                    watchlistGrid.appendChild(watchlistCard);
                });
            }
        }

        function removeFromWatchlist(button) {
            button.parentElement.remove();
            saveWatchlistData();
            showNotification('Player removed from watchlist', 'info');
        }

        function getTimeAgo(timestamp) {
            const now = Date.now();
            const diff = now - timestamp;
            
            if (diff < 60 * 1000) return 'just now';
            if (diff < 60 * 60 * 1000) return `${Math.floor(diff / (60 * 1000))} min ago`;
            if (diff < 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) return `${Math.floor(diff / (60 * 60 * 1000))} hr ago`;
            return `${Math.floor(diff / (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000))} days ago`;
        }

        // Enhanced initialization
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            setupAdvancedFilters();
            loadWatchlistData();
            
            // Auto-save watchlist when changes are made
            const watchlistGrid = document.getElementById('watchlist-grid');
            if (watchlistGrid) {
                const observer = new MutationObserver(() => saveWatchlistData());
                observer.observe(watchlistGrid, { childList: true });
            }
            

            // Enhanced Transfer Hub Functionality
            function initializeEnhancedFeatures() {
                // Enhanced Search with debouncing
                const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
                let searchTimeout;
                
                if (searchInput) {
                    searchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
                        clearTimeout(searchTimeout);
                        const searchTerm = this.value.toLowerCase().trim();
                        
                        searchTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                            performEnhancedSearch(searchTerm);
                        }, 300);
                    });
                }

                // Real-time transfer data updates
                initializeRealTimeUpdates();
                
                // Enhanced filter combinations
                setupAdvancedFiltering();
                
                // Transfer value tracking
                initializeValueTracking();
                
                // Interactive transfer timeline
                setupInteractiveTimeline();
                
                // Live notifications system
                initializeLiveNotifications();
                
                console.log('Enhanced transfer hub features initialized');
            }

            function performEnhancedSearch(searchTerm) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                const rumorCards = document.querySelectorAll('.rumor-card');
                let visibleCount = 0;
                
                // Enhanced search algorithm
                const searchWords = searchTerm.split(' ').filter(word => word.length > 0);
                
                [...transferCards, ...rumorCards].forEach(card => {
                    if (!card) return;
                    
                    const cardData = extractCardData(card);
                    const relevanceScore = calculateRelevanceScore(cardData, searchWords);
                    
                    if (relevanceScore > 0) {
                        card.style.display = 'block';
                        card.style.order = Math.floor((1 - relevanceScore) * 1000);
                        visibleCount++;
                        highlightSearchTerms(card, searchWords);
                    } else {
                        card.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                });
                
                updateSearchResults(visibleCount, searchTerm);
            }

            function extractCardData(card) {
                const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent || '';
                const clubs = card.querySelector('.transfer-clubs')?.textContent || '';
                const position = card.querySelector('.player-position')?.textContent || '';
                const fee = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee')?.textContent || '';
                const status = card.querySelector('.transfer-status')?.textContent || '';
                
                return {
                    playerName: playerName.toLowerCase(),
                    clubs: clubs.toLowerCase(),
                    position: position.toLowerCase(),
                    fee: fee.toLowerCase(),
                    status: status.toLowerCase(),
                    fullText: card.textContent.toLowerCase()
                };
            }

            function calculateRelevanceScore(cardData, searchWords) {
                let score = 0;
                
                searchWords.forEach(word => {
                    // Player name gets highest weight
                    if (cardData.playerName.includes(word)) score += 3;
                    // Club names get high weight
                    if (cardData.clubs.includes(word)) score += 2.5;
                    // Position gets medium weight
                    if (cardData.position.includes(word)) score += 1.5;
                    // Fee and status get lower weight
                    if (cardData.fee.includes(word)) score += 1;
                    if (cardData.status.includes(word)) score += 1;
                    // General text match gets minimal weight
                    if (cardData.fullText.includes(word)) score += 0.5;
                });
                
                return Math.min(score / searchWords.length, 1);
            }

            function highlightSearchTerms(card, searchWords) {
                // Remove existing highlights
                card.querySelectorAll('.search-highlight').forEach(highlight => {
                    const parent = highlight.parentNode;
                    parent.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(highlight.textContent), highlight);
                    parent.normalize();
                });
                
                // Add new highlights
                searchWords.forEach(word => {
                    const walker = document.createTreeWalker(
                        card,
                        NodeFilter.SHOW_TEXT,
                        null,
                        false
                    );
                    
                    const textNodes = [];
                    let node;
                    
                    while (node = walker.nextNode()) {
                        if (node.nodeValue.toLowerCase().includes(word)) {
                            textNodes.push(node);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    textNodes.forEach(textNode => {
                        const regex = new RegExp(`(${word})`, 'gi');
                        const content = textNode.nodeValue;
                        
                        if (regex.test(content)) {
                            const span = document.createElement('span');
                            span.innerHTML = content.replace(regex, '<span class="search-highlight">$1</span>');
                            textNode.parentNode.replaceChild(span, textNode);
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

            function initializeRealTimeUpdates() {
                const transferData = [
                    {
                        player: 'Martin Zubimendi',
                        from: 'Real Sociedad',
                        to: 'Liverpool',
                        fee: '‚Ç¨60M',
                        position: 'Defensive Midfielder',
                        status: 'In Progress',
                        probability: 85
                    },
                    {
                        player: 'Jo√£o Palhinha',
                        from: 'Fulham',
                        to: 'Bayern Munich',
                        fee: '‚Ç¨50M',
                        position: 'Defensive Midfielder',
                        status: 'Medical Pending',
                        probability: 92
                    },
                    {
                        player: 'Jorrel Hato',
                        from: 'Ajax',
                        to: 'Chelsea',
                        fee: '‚Ç¨35M',
                        position: 'Centre-Back',
                        status: 'Negotiating',
                        probability: 68
                    }
                ];

                // Simulate real-time updates
                setInterval(() => {
                    const randomTransfer = transferData[Math.floor(Math.random() * transferData.length)];
                    const probabilityChange = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10;
                    randomTransfer.probability = Math.max(0, Math.min(100, randomTransfer.probability + probabilityChange));
                    
                    updateTransferProbability(randomTransfer);
                    
                    if (Math.random() > 0.8) {
                        showLiveUpdate(randomTransfer);
                    }
                }, 15000);
            }

            function updateTransferProbability(transfer) {
                const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                cards.forEach(card => {
                    const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent;
                    if (playerName && playerName.includes(transfer.player)) {
                        const probabilityElement = card.querySelector('.probability-bar');
                        if (probabilityElement) {
                            probabilityElement.style.width = `${transfer.probability}%`;
                            probabilityElement.style.transition = 'width 0.8s ease';
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            function setupAdvancedFiltering() {
                const filters = {
                    club: document.getElementById('club-filter'),
                    position: document.getElementById('position-filter'),
                    feeRange: document.getElementById('fee-range')
                };

                // Enhanced fee range filtering
                if (filters.feeRange) {
                    filters.feeRange.addEventListener('change', function() {
                        const range = this.value;
                        filterByFeeRange(range);
                    });
                }

                // Enhanced position filtering
                if (filters.position) {
                    filters.position.addEventListener('change', function() {
                        const position = this.value;
                        filterByPosition(position);
                    });
                }
            }

            function filterByFeeRange(range) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const feeText = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee')?.textContent || '';
                    const feeValue = extractFeeValue(feeText);
                    
                    let show = true;
                    
                    switch(range) {
                        case '0-20':
                            show = feeValue >= 0 && feeValue <= 20;
                            break;
                        case '20-50':
                            show = feeValue > 20 && feeValue <= 50;
                            break;
                        case '50-100':
                            show = feeValue > 50 && feeValue <= 100;
                            break;
                        case '100+':
                            show = feeValue > 100;
                            break;
                        default:
                            show = true;
                    }
                    
                    if (feeText.toLowerCase().includes('loan') || feeText.toLowerCase().includes('free')) {
                        show = range === 'all' || range === '0-20';
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }

            function extractFeeValue(feeText) {
                const match = feeText.match(/[¬£‚Ç¨]?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?)[mM]/);
                return match ? parseFloat(match[1]) : 0;
            }

            function filterByPosition(position) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                const positionMappings = {
                    'goalkeeper': ['goalkeeper', 'keeper', 'gk'],
                    'defender': ['defender', 'back', 'centre-back', 'full-back', 'wing-back'],
                    'midfielder': ['midfielder', 'midfield', 'central', 'attacking midfielder', 'defensive midfielder'],
                    'forward': ['forward', 'striker', 'winger', 'centre-forward', 'right winger', 'left winger']
                };
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const positionText = card.querySelector('.player-position')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
                    
                    let show = position === 'all';
                    
                    if (position !== 'all' && positionMappings[position]) {
                        show = positionMappings[position].some(pos => positionText.includes(pos));
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }

            function initializeValueTracking() {
                // Add market value tracking for players
                const playerValues = {
                    'Viktor Gyokeres': { current: 55.3, change: +12.8, trend: 'up' },
                    'Bryan Mbeumo': { current: 71.0, change: +25.5, trend: 'up' },
                    'Benjamin Sesko': { current: 66.3, change: +8.2, trend: 'up' },
                    'Jack Grealish': { current: 45.0, change: -15.0, trend: 'down' },
                    'Milos Kerkez': { current: 40.0, change: +18.0, trend: 'up' }
                };

                // Update transfer cards with value information
                document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card').forEach(card => {
                    const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent;
                    if (playerName && playerValues[playerName]) {
                        const value = playerValues[playerName];
                        addValueIndicator(card, value);
                    }
                });
            }

            function addValueIndicator(card, value) {
                const playerInfo = card.querySelector('.player-info');
                if (playerInfo && !playerInfo.querySelector('.value-indicator')) {
                    const indicator = document.createElement('div');
                    indicator.className = 'value-indicator';
                    indicator.innerHTML = `
                        <span class="market-value">Market Value: ¬£${value.current}M</span>
                        <span class="value-change ${value.trend}">
                            ${value.change > 0 ? '+' : ''}${value.change}M
                            <i class="fas fa-arrow-${value.trend === 'up' ? 'up' : 'down'}"></i>
                        </span>
                    `;
                    playerInfo.appendChild(indicator);
                }
            }

            function setupInteractiveTimeline() {
                const timelineItems = document.querySelectorAll('.timeline-item');
                
                timelineItems.forEach(item => {
                    item.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        this.classList.toggle('expanded');
                        
                        // Add detailed information
                        if (this.classList.contains('expanded') && !this.querySelector('.timeline-details')) {
                            const details = document.createElement('div');
                            details.className = 'timeline-details';
                            details.innerHTML = `
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-calendar"></i>
                                    <span>Expected completion: Next 48 hours</span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i>
                                    <span>Transfer probability: 85%</span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-newspaper"></i>
                                    <span>Last update: 2 hours ago</span>
                                </div>
                            `;
                            this.appendChild(details);
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

            function initializeLiveNotifications() {
                // Create notification container
                if (!document.querySelector('.notification-container')) {
                    const container = document.createElement('div');
                    container.className = 'notification-container';
                    document.body.appendChild(container);
                }
                
                // Show random live updates
                const liveUpdates = [
                    { type: 'transfer', message: 'üö® BREAKING: Medical scheduled for tomorrow', priority: 'high' },
                    { type: 'rumor', message: 'üìà UPDATE: Transfer probability increased', priority: 'medium' },
                    { type: 'confirmed', message: '‚úÖ CONFIRMED: Deal announcement imminent', priority: 'high' },
                    { type: 'bid', message: 'üí∞ NEW BID: Club increases offer by ¬£5M', priority: 'medium' }
                ];
                
                setInterval(() => {
                    if (Math.random() > 0.85) {
                        const update = liveUpdates[Math.floor(Math.random() * liveUpdates.length)];
                        showLiveNotification(update);
                    }
                }, 25000);
            }

            function showLiveNotification(update) {
                const container = document.querySelector('.notification-container');
                if (!container) return;
                
                const notification = document.createElement('div');
                notification.className = `live-notification ${update.priority}`;
                notification.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="notification-content">
                        <span class="notification-message">${update.message}</span>
                        <button class="notification-close">×</button>
                    </div>
                `;
                
                container.appendChild(notification);
                
                // Auto remove after 5 seconds
                setTimeout(() => {
                    notification.classList.add('fade-out');
                    setTimeout(() => notification.remove(), 300);
                }, 5000);
                
                // Manual close
                notification.querySelector('.notification-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
                    notification.classList.add('fade-out');
                    setTimeout(() => notification.remove(), 300);
                });
            }

            function showLiveUpdate(transfer) {
                const message = `üìä ${transfer.player}: Transfer probability updated to ${Math.round(transfer.probability)}%`;
                showLiveNotification({ type: 'update', message, priority: 'low' });
            }

            function updateSearchResults(visibleCount, searchTerm) {
                const container = document.querySelector('.transfers-grid')?.parentElement;
                if (!container) return;
                
                let resultsIndicator = container.querySelector('.search-results-indicator');
                
                if (searchTerm.length > 0) {
                    if (!resultsIndicator) {
                        resultsIndicator = document.createElement('div');
                        resultsIndicator.className = 'search-results-indicator';
                        container.insertBefore(resultsIndicator, container.querySelector('.transfers-grid'));
                    }
                    
                    resultsIndicator.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="results-info">
                            <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
                            <span>${visibleCount} result${visibleCount !== 1 ? 's' : ''} for "${searchTerm}"</span>
                            ${visibleCount === 0 ? '<button class="clear-search" onclick="clearSearch()">Clear search</button>' : ''}
                        </div>
                    `;
                } else if (resultsIndicator) {
                    resultsIndicator.remove();
                }
            }

            function clearSearch() {
                const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
                if (searchInput) {
                    searchInput.value = '';
                    searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));
                }
            }

            // Initialize enhanced features
            setTimeout(initializeEnhancedFeatures, 1000);

        });

    </script>
</body>
</html>
